agents.name: Agent1
agents.note: Completed US-003: Refactor config modules - loader and helpers. Created loader.py (loadObdConfig, validateObdConfig, OBD_DEFAULTS), helpers.py (17 functions), simulator.py (7 functions). 38 config tests pass, 324 total tests pass.

agents.note: Working on US-005: Refactor display modules - drivers. Creating display/drivers/ subpackage with BaseDisplayDriver, HeadlessDisplayDriver, MinimalDisplayDriver, DeveloperDisplayDriver.

agents.name: Agent3
agents.note: Completed US-043: Create simulator CLI commands. Implemented SimulatorCli class with keyboard commands (p=pause/resume, f=inject failure, c=clear failures, s=status, h=help, q=quit). Non-blocking input via background thread. 44 tests passing.
